import { Button, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, Input, Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material'; import React from 'react' const NFT_Making = () => { const [inputs, setInputs] = React.useState({image: null, name:null, externalLink: null, description: null, collection: null, trait_type: null, value: null}); return (
Create New Item
*Required fields
Image, Video, Audio, or 3D Model *
File types supported: JPG, PNG, GIF, SVG, MP4, WEBM, MP3, WAV, OGG, GLB, GLTF. Max size: 100 MB
{/* */}
Name *
setInputs({...inputs,['name']: e.target.value}) }>
External link
setInputs({...inputs,['externalLink']: e.target.value}) }>
Description
setInputs({...inputs,['description']: e.target.value}) }>
Collection
setInputs({...inputs,['collection']: e.target.value}) }>
Attributes
trait_type
setInputs({...inputs,['trait_type']: e.target.value}) }>
value
setInputs({...inputs,['value']: e.target.value}) }>
) } export default NFT_Making;
